policy.title: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
policy.intro: By using this service, you agree to the following terms.

data.title: Data Collection
data.text: We collect personal data such as email and username for account identification. Data is stored securely.

security.title: Security
security.text: We use encryption to protect your information and do not share data with third parties.

usage.title: Usage Rules
usage.text: Users must follow ethical standards and not misuse the service.
